name: Last wish (Tundenizer)
description:
Game made for JamDNA16 

You are the leader of a cult and once a year there is a meeting to see who will be the sacrifice to change the world.

Controls: left mouse button

Criteria

1. Atmospheric - main aspect of the game is its atmosphere and exploring what it has to offer.

2. Carnival - part of the setting is in a abandoned carnival.

3. Wasi - there is an act of slapping some one to the face. 

4.Eerie - the music is slow and fits the eerie atmosphere of the game.

credits:
